content: shanti hat specs ewe ewe yarns pattern #120 designed by robyn devine sizes preemie baby medium large measurements 12 14 18 22 inches around yarn ewe ewe wooly worsted 95 yards preemie 1 skein baby 1 skein medium 2 skeins large 2 skeins 78 sapphire shown crochet hook size k/10 5 6 5 mm supplies darning needle gauge 14 double_crochet over 4 note instructions are written in us crochet terminology begin round 1 chain 4 slip_stitch to first chain to form a ring chain 3 9 double_crochet in ring 10 double_crochet round 2 chain 3 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet 20 double_crochet round 3 chain 3 *2 double_crochet in first double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet * repeat from *to* around 30 double_crochet round 4 chain 3 *2 double_crochet in first double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet * repeat from *to* around 40 double_crochet preemie ** for preemie size rounds 5-8 work as for round 8 below ** copyright © 2014 ewe ewe yarns llc round 5 chain 3 *2 double_crochet in first double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet * repeat from rev 1 *to* around 50 double_crochet baby stitch ** for baby size rounds 6-11 work as for round 8 below ** chain chain glossary sl slip round 6 chain 3 *2 double_crochet in first double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet * repeat from st stitch *to* around 60 double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet medium ** for medium size rounds 7-16 work as for round 8 below ** fpdc front post double_crochet bpdc back post double_crochet round 7 chain 3 *2 double_crochet in first double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet * repeat from *to* around 70 double_crochet round 8 chain 3 1 double_crochet in each double_crochet around large ** for large size rounds 9-17 work as for round 8 ** brim next round chain 2 *fpdc around first double_crochet bpdc around next double_crochet * repeat from *to* around repeat this round until brim measures 1 1½ 2 2 inches finish weave in all yarn ends love www eweewe com | facebook com/eweeweyarns | instagram com/eweeweyarns | #eweeweyarns
